description:
This market refers to the Valorant match between Gamax Esports and Ghools Esports in the VCL MENA: Resilience Kickoff Group Stage - NA, scheduled for January 18 at 11:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Ghools Esports" if Ghools Esports wins 2 or more maps than Gamax Esports in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Gamax Esports".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market will resolve to "Gamax Esports" if Gamax Esports win against Ghools Esports in the named Valorant match in the VCL MENA: Resilience Kickoff Group Stage - NA, scheduled for January 18 at 11:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Ghools Esports" if Ghools Esports win against Gamax Esports in the Valorant match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/valorant/Main_Page.
events.title: Valorant: Gamax Esports vs Ghools Esports (BO3) - VCL MENA: Resilience Kickoff Group Stage - NA

groupItemTitle: Map Handicap: GLS (-1.5) vs Gamax Esports (+1.5)
question: Map Handicap: GLS (-1.5) vs Gamax Esports (+1.5)
